title: Championship riven 2016
body:
Hey guys,

quick qeustion!

when will this skin become available?

greetz,

larykoekje

replies.body: I don't know, I'm afraid!  I don't have the details on upcoming content until it's been released, but any updates will be posted on our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page.  Patience!
